code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var getTitle=function getTitle(note){var title=note.body.split('\n')[0];if(title.length>45){return title.slice(0,45);}return title;};var getTime=function getTime(note){var time=note.updated;return new Date(time).toLocaleDateString();};var getContent=function getContent(note){var title=getTitle(note);var content=note.body.replaceAll('/n','');content=content.replaceAll(title,'');if(content.length>45){return content.slice(0,45)+'...';}return content;};var ListItem=function ListItem(_ref){var note=_ref.note;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/note/".concat(note.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"notes-list-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:[" ",getTitle(note)," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[getTime(note)," ",getContent(note)?'-':null," ",getContent(note)]})})]})})});};export default ListItem;
